Abstract: The MYD17A3H Version 6 product provides information about annual (yearly) Net Primary Production at 500 meter pixel resolution.  Annual NPP is derived from the sum of the 45, 8-day Net Photosynthesis  (PSN) products (MYD17A2H) from the given year.  The PSN value is the difference of the GPP and the Maintenance Respiration (MR) (GPP-MR). Stage 3 validation has been achieved for MOD17 products.

RelatedUrls.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
Interface to search, discover, and access EOS data products, and invoke available data services.
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

The MODIS Reprojection Tool on the Web (MRTWeb) is available for selected MODIS land products.  MRTWebâ€™s capabilities include reprojecting to alternate map projections, spatial and spectral subsetting, resampling, and alternate output format options.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

The USGS Global Visualization Viewer (GloVis) is an online search and order tool driven by browse images.  Users may select any geographical area of interest (for any given product) and view all available browse images for that area before deciding to order those products.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: NDAYS_COMPOSITED
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of days of the data that have been composited.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttributes.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODNPP
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good Net Primary Production (NPP) quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODPSN
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good Net Photosynthesis (PSN) quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttributes.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

EntryTitle: MODIS/Aqua Net Primary Production Yearly L4 Global 500m SIN Grid V006
